mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where OBJECT=#{value} and SUBJECT != #{value} and READ_FLAG=0

select notice_type, notice_id, b.employee_name subject_name, subject subject_id, b.FILE_POSITION, reg_date, link_id from (select idx, notice_type, notice_id, subject, reg_date, read_flag, link_id from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY importance_level asc, reg_date desc) idx, notice_type, notice_id, link_id, subject, object, importance_level, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss') reg_date, read_flag from (select n.notice_type, n.notice_id, n.subject, t.IMPORTANCE_LEVEL, n.object, n.reg_date, n.read_flag, link_id from notice n, notice_type t where n.notice_type = t.notice_type_id) where object = #{user_id} and read_flag = 0) a where idx between 1 + #{perContentNum}*(#{startIdx}-1) and #{startIdx}*#{perContentNum}) a, employee b where a.subject != #{user_id} and a.subject = b.employee_id order by idx asc
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET read_flag = 1 WHERE notice_id = #{value}

select.if: select unconfirmed.* from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY n.reg_date desc, nt.importance_level) idx,nt.IMPORTANCE_LEVEL,n.NOTICE_TYPE,n.NOTICE_ID,n.REG_DATE, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,n.reg_date)/12) || 'year ' || TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, n.reg_date) - TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, n.reg_date)/12) * 12) || 'month ' || TRUNC((MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,n.reg_date) - TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, n.reg_date))) * 30.5) || 'day ' || trunc(mod((sysdate-n.REG_DATE),1)*24) ||'h '|| trunc(mod((sysdate-n.REG_DATE)*24,1)*60) || 'min ' ||trunc(round(mod((sysdate-n.REG_DATE)*24*60,1)*60)) || 'sec ' passtime, e.EMPLOYEE_NAME,case when notice_type='DAILY_POST' then e1.employee_name || '님이 일일업무('||dr.title ||') 보고서를 작성하였습니다' when notice_type='WEEKLY_POST' then e1.employee_name || '님이 주간업무('||wr.title||' )보고서를 작성하였습니다.' when notice_type='DAILY_CORRECT' then e1.employee_name || '님이 일일업무('||dr.title ||') 보고서를 수정하였습니다.' when notice_type='WEEKLY_CORRECT' then e1.employee_name || '님이 주간업무('||wr.title||') 보고서를 수정하였습니다.' END as content, n.link_id,n.SUBJECT from notice n,notice_type nt, employee e, employee e1,WEEKLY_REPORT wr,DAILY_REPORT dr where e.employee_id=n.object and e1.employee_id=n.subject and n.object=#{employee_id} and n.notice_type=nt.notice_type_id and n.READ_FLAG=0 and notice_type like #{type} and wr.LINK_ID(+)=n.link_id and dr.daily_report_id(+)=n.link_id) unconfirmed where unconfirmed.idx BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
